sn22.8:1.5: Idha, bhikkhave, assutavā puthujjano rūpaṁ ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassati.
sn22.8:1.6: Tassa taṁ rūpaṁ vipariṇamati aññathā hoti.
sn22.8:1.11: viññāṇaṁ ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassati.
sn22.8:1.12: Tassa taṁ viññāṇaṁ vipariṇamati aññathā hoti.
sn22.8:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako rūpaṁ ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassati.
sn22.8:2.3: Tassa taṁ rūpaṁ vipariṇamati aññathā hoti.
sn22.8:2.8: viññāṇaṁ ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassati.
sn22.8:2.9: Tassa taṁ viññāṇaṁ vipariṇamati aññathā hoti.
